H0.text: Ozone is the substance necessary for burning to take place.

H1.text: Oxygen is the substance necessary for burning to take place.

H2.text: Hydrogen is the substance necessary for burning to take place.

H3.text: Carbon dioxide is the substance necessary for burning to take place.

A4.text: Concentrated O2 will allow combustion to proceed rapidly and energetically.

A5.text: Oxygen is used in oxyacetylene welding, burning acetylene with O2 to produce a very hot flame.
